loading.title: Loading Configuration...
loading.description: Please wait while we set up the application.

error.instructions: Please check that the application is properly deployed and try refreshing the page.

conversationLanguageSelector.label: Conversation Language
conversationLanguageSelector.description: Choose the language for AI persona responses and voice synthesis

businessContext.title: Business Context & Scenario
businessContext.description: Your business situation and background information

title.title: Business Context & Scenario
title.description: Your business situation and background information

imageUpload.title: Image Upload
imageUpload.clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
imageUpload.selectValid: Please select a valid image file
imageUpload.description: Upload slides, documents, charts, or any visual content you want the AI personas to analyze and discuss. Large files are automatically chunked to ensure reliable upload.
imageUpload.fileSizeExceeded: File size exceeds maximum limit of {{maxSize}}MB
imageUpload.supportedFormats: Supports: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, BMP, TIFF (max {{maxSize}}MB)

name.label: Name
name.description: The display name for this persona

role.label: Role
role.description: The role or title of this persona

details.label: Details
details.description: Describe this persona's background, priorities, concerns, and influence level in your own words

avatar.label: Avatar
avatar.description: Choose an avatar to represent this persona

voice.label: Voice
voice.description: Choose a voice for this persona's speech synthesis

placeholders.detailsExample:
Example:

Technology leader with 15+ years of experience in enterprise software development. Evaluates technical feasibility and architecture decisions.

PRIORITIES: Technical feasibility, security, performance
CONCERNS: Technical debt, scalability issues, integration complexity
INFLUENCE: High - Key technical decision maker

messages.defaultPersonaNote: You are editing a default persona. Changes will only apply to this session and won't be saved permanently.

messages.reset: Personas have been reset to their original state
messages.customPersonasInfo: You have {{count}} custom persona(s). Custom personas are only saved for this session.
messages.exportError: Please select at least one persona to export

search.placeholder: Search personas by name, role, or details...

warnings.tooManySelected: You have selected {{count}} personas. For optimal conversation flow, we recommend selecting no more than 15 personas.

delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the custom persona "{{name}}"?

errors.noConversationTopicFound: No conversation topic found in the imported file.

title.label: Conversation Title
title.description: A concise title for your conversation topic

scenario.label: Scenario Description
scenario.description: Describe your conversation topic in detail. Include context, audience, background, stakes, timeline, and any other relevant information.

placeholders.scenarioExample:
Describe your conversation scenario including:
- What you're discussing or exploring
- The context and setting
- Key objectives and outcomes
- Any specific constraints or requirements

loading.title: Checking Authentication...
loading.description: Please wait while we verify your credentials.

error.description: There was an error with authentication: {{error}}

signIn.description: Please sign in to access the application.

voiceSettings.title: Voice Settings
voiceSettings.saveError: Failed to save voice settings. Changes will be lost when you leave the session.
voiceSettings.loadError: Failed to load voice settings. Please try again.
voiceSettings.voiceEnabledDescription: Voice synthesis is enabled for this session. Individual persona voices can be configured in the persona editor on the home page before starting a session.
voiceSettings.voiceDisabledDescription: Enable voice synthesis to configure playback settings. Individual persona voices can be set in the persona editor on the home page.

voiceTextArea.clickToAddVoice: Click to add voice input to your text
